sentences.en: Conciliation can be conducted by a single judge or a collegiate panel.
sentences.cn: 调解可以由审判员一人主持,也可以由合议庭主持.

sentences.en: Developed with the collegiate soccer player in mind, but applicable to other sports.
sentences.cn: 在头脑与学院的足球运动员一起发展了, 但是对另外的运动适用.

sentences.en: Fifth Anniversary Celebration at Agincourt Collegiate Institute.
sentences.cn: 华基五周年感恩记念会,借爱正中学聚餐庆祝.

sentences.en: I see though that Merriam - Webster's Collegiate Dictionary gives a first English citation of 1775.
sentences.cn: 《韦氏词典》就这个词在英语中出现的最早引证是1775年.

sentences.en: Lancaster is one of only six collegiate universities in the UK.
sentences.cn: 兰卡斯特是英国6所联合大学之一.

sentences.en: Members of the collegiate bench must total an odd number.
sentences.cn: 合议庭的成员人数,必须是单数.

sentences.en: News man: President Kennedy met with the collegiate All - American Football Team at the oval office today.
sentences.cn: 播音员: 肯尼迪总统在椭圆形办公室接见了全美大学足球队.
牛津是由学院组成的大学.

sentences.en: Professor Dale Hess directs Goshen College's Environmental Education Collegiate Program.
sentences.cn: DaleHess教授指导Goshen学院环境教育学院的项目.

sentences.en: Television: President Kennedy met with the collegiate All - American Football Team at the Oval Office today.
sentences.cn: 电视: 肯尼迪总统今日在白宫椭圆形办公室里接见全美大学足球明星队.

sentences.en: The approximately 180 judges in the Judiciary a strong collegiate spirit.
sentences.cn: 我们约有180位法官,他们秉持司法机构的理念,同侪共事.

sentences.en: The official name of the Battle of the Brains is the ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest.
sentences.cn: 大脑之战的官方名称为ACM国际学院编程竞赛.

sentences.en: The problem of attracting more applicants from poorer backgrounds is not confined to collegiate universities.
sentences.cn: 吸引更多贫困学生申请入学,并不仅仅是联合大学需要面对的问题.

sentences.en: The university de - emphasized inter - collegiate football.
sentences.cn: 该大学贬低校际橄榄球赛的重要性.

sentences.en: This is a volume - based agreement purchased for a collegiate institution.
sentences.cn: 这是供学院单位使用的以量为基准的协议.
